headline: Analysts Lift PT on Zebra Technologies Corporation (ZBRA) Amid Stronger Outlook
summary: Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ:ZBRA) is one of the 12 Cheap Technology Stocks to Invest In According to Hedge Funds. On February 13, TheFly reported that Morgan Stanley lifted the price target on Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ:ZBRA) from $309 to $323, keeping its Equal Weight rating on the stock. Morgan Stanley’s analyst Meta Marshall remains positive […]
